text: Many radio stations currently use the brand K-Hits: *WBMX, Chicago, Illinois, USA *KHTT, Tulsa, Oklahoma, USA *KADD, Logandale, Nevada, USA *KTHI, Caldwell, Idaho, USA *KHYT, Tucson, Arizona, USA *KPKL, Deer Park, Washington, USA *KZID, Culdesac, Idaho, USA *KHTE-FM, Little Rock, Arkansas, USA *KCCL, Woodland, California, United States Stations that used to use this branding: *KHIT-FM, Madera, California, USA *KHTZ, Los Angeles, California, USA *KGLK, Lake Jackson, Texas, USA *KHHT, Denver, Colorado, USA *KIHT, St. Louis, Missouri, USA *KLTH, Portland, Oregon, USA *KMJE (FM), Placerville, California, USA *KMXP, Phoenix, Arizona, USA *KLYY, Riverside, California, USA
title: K-Hits
